biotools.summary: Annotates four major splicing types by RNA-Seq data, including intron retention, exon skipping, alternative donor site, and alternative acceptor site. As a post-processing tool for alignment files, it annotates the alternative splicing types with details at the intron or exon level.

bioschemas.name: SplicingTypesAnno
